page.title: 15 Local Houses
page.content: Near the top of the town opposite Sevenoaks School there is a Post Office that is 500 years old. Above the Post Office there is an old house which has very old windows, which are called lead light windows. Then if you move down the High street a little bit you come to a house called The Chantry. This is very big house. It was built around the 17th century. The Chantry had so many windows that some of them had to be blocked up because of the window taxes. Down the High street a bit more we sat in St. Nicholas' Church Yard and drew an old house opposite us. Around St.Nicholas' Church there are a lot of listed houses. Most of them don't have any front gardens, they just look straight onto the road.Then we went down to the Vine and looked at the Pavilion. Then we went back to school.
